definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 這個風景英俊山區和上莊儲藏着很多溫泉。

sentences.english: Over the mountains, and under the sky-riding dirty grey horses, go you and I.
sentences.chinese: 在山區，天空下騎骯髒的灰色馬，去你和我。

sentences.english: As dusk descends on the mountains, a pangolin emerges from its burrow.
sentences.chinese: 當薄暮湧入山區，一隻穿山甲從地洞鑽了出來。

sentences.english: The superior natural conditions of Wannan mountainous region make it one of China's better tea producing regions.
sentences.chinese: 皖南山區自然條件優越，是我國重點產茶區之一。

sentences.english: Speaking of Fortune kiln, not only hemp cities, mountains are famous throughout the eastern Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 說起富鑫窯，不單麻城市，整個鄂東山區都赫赫有名。

sentences.english: Changle over mountain rivers flowing through hilly, water development, water rich.
sentences.chinese: 長樂以上，河流經丘陵山區，水系發育，水量豐富。

sentences.english: The mountain ridges in this area twist and twine, stretching endlessly.
sentences.chinese: 這個山區的山脈蜿蜒曲折，連綿不絕。

sentences.english: Dall's sheep and mountain goats are found in the park's alpine environment.
sentences.chinese: 公園的山區還有大角羊和山羊出沒。

sentences.english: The mostly of molybdenum mine are concentrated at the Gangtun town of Lianshan District in Holudao city.
sentences.chinese: 而鉬礦主要集中在葫蘆島市連山區鋼屯鎮。

sentences.english: An a mountainous area county attends a meeting research agriculture and rural economics job.
sentences.chinese: 一個山區縣開會研究農業和農村經濟工作。

sentences.english: Meese said she has been to the base, which is in a big nature park.
sentences.chinese: 米斯說她曾到過那個山區，那是個大型自然公園。

sentences.english: The Opening Ceremony of the Universiade is in Nanshan District.
sentences.chinese: 大運會開幕式在南山區。

sentences.english: Yiyang city includes Ziyang district and Heshan district.
sentences.chinese: 益陽市城區包括資陽區和赫山區。

sentences.english: Reduce the PR in Mid-levels West.
sentences.chinese: 降低半山區西部的地積比率。

sentences.english: The village in an out-of-the-way mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 這個村子位於一個偏僻的山區。

sentences.english: LongKey has been listed by Wuxi Municipal as Xishan District "123" plan supporting enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 被無錫政府列爲錫山區重點“123”計劃支持企業。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
